dcterms:creator: Vassil Panayotov
Guoguo Chen
Daniel Povey
Sanjeev Khudanpur
dcterms:description: A corpus containing around 1,000 hours of read English speech from a total of 2,302 speakers at a sample rate of 16 kHz, used for training and evaluating speech coding models.
dcterms:title: LibriSpeech

dcterms:description: An augmented version of the LibriSpeech dataset that includes additional data from the test speakers for training purposes.
dcterms:title: Augmented LibriSpeech (LSplus)

dcterms:description: A proprietary dataset consisting of 10 American English speakers totaling approximately 300 hours of speech, recorded in studio conditions.
dcterms:title: Studio corpus
